original_text: But they did not understand this saying, and it was concealed from them, so that they might not perceive it. And they were afraid to ask him about this saying.
korean_text: 그들이 이 말씀을 알지 못하니 이는 그들로 깨닫지 못하게 숨긴 바 되었음이라 또 그들은 이 말씀을 묻기도 두려워하더라

sentences.original_text: But they did not understand this saying
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 이 말씀을 알지 못하였으니

sentences.original_text: and it was concealed from them
so that they might not perceive it

sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 이 말씀에 대하여 그에게 묻는 것을 두려워하였더라
